articles.author: Kunal Manchanada
articles.title: Ahead of IPO, Swiggy rolls out ESOP liquidity program worth $65 Mn - Entrackr
articles.description: Swiggy has announced an ESOPs buyback worth $65 million. This marks its fifth ESOP liquidity programme at Swiggy since 2018.

articles.title: Phillip Capital sees a 56% downside potential in IREDA shares as best value already priced in - The Economic Times
articles.description: Phillip Capital maintains a sell view on IREDA, citing concerns over earnings growth not keeping pace with loan growth. Despite strong loan growth prospects, the company faces challenges in maintaining return ratios and credit costs.
